A G R S T U 

A

adjustDate() - Method in class Tracker
Increments the current date int value of the Tracker.

G

getDate() - Method in class Tracker
Returns the current date int value of the Tracker.
getDeliInfo() - Method in class Tracker
Returns the Delivery Information of the Tracker.
getSeqNum() - Method in class Tracker
Gets the current Sequence Number value of the Tracker.
getTime() - Method in class Tracker
Returns the number of minutes passed since beginning the Tracker's running thread.

R

run() - Method in class Tracker
Initiates the thread reliant commands of the class: Increments the current date, and updates the status of deliveries every 2 minutes.

S

setDate(LocalDate) - Method in class Tracker
Sets the current date int value of the Tracker based on the given LocalDate parameter.
showAllDeliveries() - Method in class Tracker
Returns the list of all deliveries, in string format.
showDate() - Method in class Tracker
Returns the current date in the Tracker in string format.
showDeliveryListPending() - Method in class Tracker
Returns the list of pending deliveries, in string format.
showSpecificShipping(String) - Method in class Tracker
Returns the corresponding status of the Delivery with the matching Tracking Number.

T

terminate() - Method in class Tracker
Ends the tracker's running thread.
Tracker - Class in <Unnamed>
The class Tracker represents an object which contains the Delivery Information of the application, as well as a thread to update the current date of the simulation.
Tracker() - Constructor for class Tracker
This constructor does not need to accept any parameters.

U

updateSeqNum() - Method in class Tracker
Updates the sequence number which will be added to the next Delivery's tracking information.
